issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
running through maven -- failed two times, then succeeded.
Running in IDEA -- hung once, then all tests passed.

comments.body: I've committed some improvement for this module in SVN revision 747030 and didn't manage to reproduce the issues afterwards (I ran tests a couple dozen times). Please, reopen it if you see tests failing again.
